author: PlayStation
description:
Ready or Not is coming July 15th. Pre-order Now: https://store.playstation.com/en-us/concept/10009213

Become an elite SWAT commander and bring order to a city overwhelmed by chaos and corruption.

Lead a team of highly-trained SWAT officers through unpredictable high-risk missions against ruthless criminals to prevent the city from spiralling into disorder. Equip real-world weapons and gear to tackle missions inspired by current events against Los Sueňos’ ruthless criminal element. 

Every decision, from squad selection to tactical breach and engagement is the difference between life and death.

Are you ready?

FEATURES

Take Command
Ready or Not delivers an immersive SWAT experience. Equip your team with authentic weapons and gear, deploy into high-stakes, real-world inspired missions to secure locations concealing unknown criminal threats and potential civilians. Every mission demands tactical precision and situational awareness. Bullets from known and concealed threats react reali
title: Ready or Not: Weight of the Badge - Console Release Date Trailer | PS5 Games

author: PlayStation
description:
Wishlist Planet of Lana II: Children of the Leaf on PlayStation Store: https://store.playstation.com/concept/10011317

Planet of Lana II: Children of the Leaf is an ambitious cinematic puzzle adventure that doubles the size and scope of the original. Launching on all platforms in 2026, this highly anticipated sequel revisits Lana and Mui's profound bond as they navigate Novo's changed world after the robot invasion.

Unravel a deeper sci-fi story where Lana confronts her own demons and a new threat tests their unbreakable bond.

#ps5 #ps5games #ps4 #ps4games
title: Planet of Lana II: Children of the Leaf - Announcement Trailer | PS5 & PS4 Games

author: PlayStation
description:
Brave the unknown on the edge of our solar system.

Stranded on a frozen planet, astronaut Ariane must brave rugged landscapes and shifting realities to rescue her wounded partner, Thomas. This action-packed sci-fi adventure blends exploration, traversal, and tense stealth gameplay.

title: Aphelion - Reveal Trailer | PS5 Games

author: PlayStation
description:
Get your first look at extended gameplay from Holstin, a survival horror set in 90s Poland, focused on investigation, combat, and
mystery. Coming to PS4® and PS5®.

It's late November 1992, and Poland is still in the early stages of its transformation
following the fall of the Soviet Union. In the small, isolated town of Jeziorne-Kolonia,
nestled in the eastern part of the country, a terrible calamity has struck, slowly
consuming everyone and everything it touches. This is also the last known location of
your close friend Bartek, before he stopped answering your calls. The mystery of his disappearance now compels you to follow in his footsteps, to uncover what brought him to this town in the first place.

#ps5 #ps5games #ps4 #ps4games
title: Holstin - Extended Gameplay Trailer | PS5 & PS4 Games

author: PlayStation
description:
Coming to PS5 later in 2025!
Wishlist today: https://store.playstation.com/en-us/concept/10014665

About NORSE: Oath of Blood

Step into the rugged, untamed beauty of dark age Norway in NORSE: Oath of Blood, a turn-based tactics game that plunges players into the heart of the Viking Age. Embark on an epic quest for vengeance as Gunnar, a young warrior whose destiny is forged in blood and betrayal. After the treacherous Steinarr Far-Spear murders his father, Jarl Gripr, and usurps his high seat, Gunnar's path is clear: rebuild, ally, and rise to reclaim honor and justice.

Craft a settlement from the ground up, gather allies from far and wide, and train a formidable warband to stand by his side. Every decision shapes the world around Gunnar, as he navigates a landscape teeming with both danger and opportunity. Face off against rival clans, forge unbreakable bonds, and outmaneuver his enemies in tactical, turn-based battles that test players' strategic prowess.

#ps5 #ps5games
title: Norse: Oath of Blood - Story Teaser | PS5 Games
